title: Customer Meters, Service Regulators, and Service Lines
content:
Customer Meters, Service Regulators, and Service Lines

State Regulations
§ 255.351 - Scope
§ 255.353 - Customer meters and regulators: location
§ 255.355 - Customer meters and regulators: protection from damage
§ 255.357 - Customer meters and service regulators: installation
§ 255.359 - Customer meter installations: operating pressure
§ 255.361 - Service lines: installation
§ 255.363 - Service lines: valve requirements
§ 255.365 - Service lines: location of valves
§ 255.367 - Service lines: general requirements for connections to main piping
§ 255.369 - Service lines: connections to cast iron or ductile iron mains
§ 255.371 - Service lines: steel
§ 255.373 - Service lines: cast iron and ductile iron
§ 255.375 - Service lines: plastic
§ 255.376 - Installation of plastic service lines by trenchless excavation
§ 255.377 - Service lines: copper
§ 255.379 - New service lines not in use
§ 255.381 - Service lines: excess flow valve performance standards
§ 255.383 - Excess flow valve customer installation
§ 255.385 - Manual service line shut-off valve installation

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
